guarding_health: Ka Jingïada ïa ka Koit ka Khiah
unified_platform_description: Kawei ka rynsan ba la pynïatylli ban ai ki jingtip shaphang ka koit ka khiah ha ka por ba dei, ban kdew lypa ïa ki jingbthei kñiang kiba lah ban jia, bad ban pynïahap ïa ki lad jingïarap ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.
member_login: Pynrung na ka bynta ki Dkhot
dedicated_platform_description: Ka rynsan ba la thaw kyrpang na ka bynta kito kiba don bynta ha ka koit ka khiah ka imlang sahlang.
asha_description: Ki nongtrei koit ka khiah ha ka imlang sahlang. Ki ai kaiphod ïa ki kas, peitngor ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ka shnong, bad ïohpdiang ïa ki jingmaham bakloi.
ngo_description: Ki para ba kongsan ha ka jingïakren paidbah. Ki pynlong ïa ki jingsurbe, pynïaid ïa ki prokam pynsngewthuh, bad pynsuk ïa ka jingsam ïa ki jingsumar pang.
clinic_description: U budlum jong ka jingshakri jingsumar. Ïoh ïa ki jingtip shaphang ka koit ka khiah ha ka thaiñ, ai kaiphod ïa ki kas ba donkam kyrkieh, bad bud dien ïa ka rukom saphriang ki jingpang.
process_description: Naduh ka jinglum jingtip, sha ki jingbatai ba la pynshai da ka AI ban ai ïa ki lad jingïarap ba shai.
data_collection_description: Ki Nongtrei ASHA, ki NGO, ki Clinic, IVR bad ki sensor IoT ki ai jingtip ha ka por ba dei.
rule_based_filtering_description: U model u jied ïa ki jingtip ba ïohlum ban lap ïa ki jingjia bym long normal bad ban pyntip khlem pynslem.
early_warnings_description: Ki jingmaham ba la phah hi ki poi sha ki nongtrei bad ki sah ha ka thup jingkynshew na ka bynta ka jingbatai.
llm_powered_prediction: Ka Jingkdew Lypa da ka LLM
llm_powered_prediction_description: Ka AI ka bishar bniah ïa ki rukom treikam ban kdew lypa ïa ki jingbthei kñiang kiba lah ban jia bad ban ai jingmut.
high_level_alerts: Ki Jingmaham sha ki Bor Bahalor
high_level_alerts_description: Ki ophisar sorkar ki pule ïa ki jingbatai na ka AI bad phah ïa ki jingmaham ba la pynshai sha ka thaiñ baroh kawei.
state_health_portals: Ki Portal Koit ka Khiah jong ka Jylla
all_rights_reserved: La Reserb ïa ki Hok Baroh
login_to_health_portal: Pynrung sha ka Portal Koit ka Khiah
login_description: Sngewbha pynrung ïa ka kyrteng bad password jong phi ban ïoh rung sha ka dashboard.
register_description: Sngewbha pyndap ïa ki jingtip jong phi ban thaw ïa ka account.
name: Kyrteng
please_fill_email_password: Sngewbha pyndap ïa ka Email bad Password
login_failed: Ka jingpynrung kam long. Sngewbha pyrshang biang.
registration_failed: Ka jingthap kyrteng kam long. Sngewbha pyrshang biang.
registration_successful: Ka jingthap kyrteng ka la jop!
arunachal_pradesh_fact: La tip na ka bynta kiSyntu ki ba phuh itynnad bad ki jaidbynriew ba bun.
assam_fact: La nam na ka bynta ki kper sh'a bad ki kyndad ba don uwei u reng.
manipur_fact: La tip kum ka 'Jewel of India' bad ka dei ka jaka ba don ka kolshor ba riewspah.
meghalaya_fact: Ka 'Ri ki Lyoh', ba la nam na ka bynta ki jingkieng jri bad ka jingjur u slap.
mizoram_fact: Ka 'Ri ki Mizo', la tip na ka bynta ki lum ki wah ba itynnad bad ki tamasa ba shongshit.
nagaland_fact: La nam na ka bynta ki jaidbynriew shipai, ki tamasa, bad ki riti dustur ba kyrpang.
sikkim_fact: Ka tnum u Lum Kanchenjunga, uba long u lum ba lai ha ka pyrthei ha ka jingjrong, bad la tip na ka bynta ki jaka jngohkai ba itynnad.
tripura_fact: La nam na ka bynta ka histori ba riewspah, kaba kynthup ïa ki ïing syiem bad ki ïingmane.
ministry_of_development_ner: Ka Tnad Pynroi - Thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi
live_alerts: Ki Jingmaham ha ka Por ba Dei
current_active_alerts: Ki jingmaham ba dang treikam mynta.
alert_prediction: Ka Jingkdew Lypa ïa ki Jingmaham
ai_powered_alert_predictions: Ki Jingkdew Lypa ïa ki Jingmaham da ka AI
click_village_for_summary: Click ha ka shnong na ka bynta ka jinglum jingtip ba la pynmih da ka AI bad ki jingai jingmut.
all_village_summaries: Ki Jinglum Jingtip jong ki Shnong Baroh
actionable_summary: Ka Jinglum Jingtip ba Lah ban Pyntreikam
